name: Flowers for the Gods
description:
Flowers For The Gods takes place in a magical spirit forest, inhabited by nothing but fauna and spirits. In it you take role of Lia, a young girl who has spent her entire life collecting flowers to appease the gods above and to keep the world alive. One day a strange shade falls over the spirit forest and Lia is forced to fight for humanity, her friends and herself. Can she do it or will she succumb to the shadows.

This game was my project for a final year module at Brunel University. The goal of the module was to come up with, design and develop an art based game. Throughout the course of 6 months we had to write monthly journals to show our thoughts and progress showing how the game was slowly being made and polished.

I am by no means an experienced game developer but in the end I am really happy with how this game turned out.
